author: Kyle Webster
description: A caraway influenced riff on a daiquiri with aquavit replacing rum. Very refreshing and suited to a summer’s afternoon, or an early evening aperitif.
name: Scandinavian Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with and strain into chilled glass
